name: Villified (Jam Edition)
description:
Made for Magical Girl Game Jam 7.
NOTE: PJ VERSIONS WERE COMPLETED AFTER THE JAM

A sandbox-type game featuring a girl who can turn into and channel smoke.
Explore, beat baddies, and set times on race trials.

Works with gamepad controller or Mouse & Keyboard

Changelog:

  • 1.01: Better indication of what the next race ring is. Improved smoke form camera. Some clarity edits in the Controls menu.
